mapper.update: UPDATE reminder SET remind_time = TO_DATE(#{remindTime},'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi'), reg_dt = sysdate WHERE remind_id = #{remindId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reminder (remind_id, thr_key, remind_time, reg_id, reg_dt) VALUES (remind_seq.nextVal,#{thrKey},TO_DATE(#{remindTime},'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi'),#{regId},sysdate)
